video.title: SPSS for Beginners - Full Course
video.description:
SPSS Statistics is a software package used for interactive, or batched, statistical analysis. Learn how to use it in this full course.

💻 Download course files here: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1LCtTh6Gt2PqFSLlUt_z2Mhu3Ha-KFujT

✏️ Course created by Barton Poulson from datalab.cc.
🔗 Check out the datalab.cc YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/datalabcc
🔗 Watch more free data science courses at http://datalab.cc/

⭐️ Course Contents ⭐️
(0:00:00) Welcome
(0:02:33) Versions, Editions, & Modules
(0:08:10) Taking a Look
(0:15:20) Sample Data
(0:19:10) Graph board Templates
(0:28:17) Bar Charts
(0:34:00) Histograms
(0:37:30) Scatterplots
(0:44:30) Frequencies
(0:53:00) Descriptives
(1:01:00) Explore
(1:12:00) Labels & Definitions
(1:23:00) Entering Data
(1:26:00) Importing Data
(1:37:00) Hierarchical Clustering
(1:48:00) Factor Analysis
(2:03:00) Regression
(2:15:00) Next Steps

--

🎉 Thanks to our Champion and Sponsor supporters:
👾 Wong Voon jinq
👾 hexploitation
👾 Katia Moran
👾 BlckPhantom
👾 Nick Raker
👾 Otis Morgan
👾 DeezMaster
👾 Treehouse

--

Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.org

Read hundreds of articles on programming: https://freecodecamp.org/news

replies.author: Hannu Koistinen
replies.text: Sorry to say, but if you have not studied statistics on university level, this course is just for nothing. Net is full of "besserwissers", who actually don't even understand what they are talking about. I suggest you buy a book, introducing statistical methods, then go to programs like SPSS, if you are still interested. Some math courses would not be bad also.

replies.author: V V
replies.text:
In my sociology department they still teach it. Literally no student is using it after graduation. The academic staff is using quantitative methods very rarely and if they do there is a statistician who is part of the team- so they don't use it too. The last time I saw this package was when a professor asked me to install it on his laptop :))) for no reason, just to have it installed :))).  
Most people that try to use this product does not know enough statistics to use it meaningfully and those that know enough statistics- they never use it. 
In my department the key reason this package is used is for some teacher to keep their positions and courses. It has nothing to do with students or industry needs, it is their teaching positions.
